import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Empview(props) { const {id} = props; const [employee,setEmployee]=useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get("http://localhost:3006/emp/view/"+id).then((res)=>setEmployee({...res.data})).catch((err)=>console.log(err)); },[]) return (
>back
